name: John Roldan Sasing
tagline: Power Platform & Dynamics 365 Engineer | AI & Automation | App Development
bio:
I help digitize processes, reduce manual work, and scale using low-code solutions mainly through Microsoft Power Platform, AI & Automations, and Custom App Development.

Worked on different software development/support projects performing various tasks ranging from analysis, design, building, testing, deployment, production support and monitoring.

I work closely with both technical teams and business stakeholders to ensure solutions are clear, measurable, and aligned with real business outcomes.
